title: The Bloodline - We Are One 2015  ak6103
description:
The Bloodline (previously known as Dirge Within) is a Rock band from Chicago, Illinois which formed in 2007.

History
Formation

Dirge Within formed in January 2007, originally calling themselves Dirge, composed of former guitarist of the bands Broken Hope and SOiL, Shaun Glass, having just departed the latter band at the time of formation In March 2007, after the band recorded a three song demo which included the songs Ã¢â‚¬Å“Forever the MartyrÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Complacency StrainÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, and Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ties that BindÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½,Glass{All Guitars & Bass} Jerms{Vocals} & Jimmy Knight{Drums} recorded the bands debut demo at Mercenary Studios in Zion, Illinois with Scott Creekmore. The demo was mixed and mastered by James Murphy of Testament and Death. The band then asked bassist Paz (March 2007) and lead guitarist Matt Szlachta (July 2007) to join as the band was writing material for what would become their debut album Force Fed Lies via Eone.
Early touring and success

The first show that Dirge Within played was in Milwaukee, Wisconsin at The Rave in July 2007. In November 2007, the band also was sponsored by ESP Guitars, Line 6, EMG Electronics, DunlopJagermeister music. The several sponsorships signified a bright future and early positive recognition for the band.Their live show was highly praised showing up many acts on most bills.

In the beginning of 2008, Dirge Within recorded another song entitled Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Last GoodbyeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ with engineer Chris Wisco in Racine, Wisconsin. James Murphy mixed and mastered the song at Safehouse Productions. In April 2008,On July 28, 2008 the band released a demo version of the song Ã¢â‚¬Å“ConfessionÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. The song was co produced by Edsel Dope of the band Dope, with James Murphy(Testament,Death) mixing and mastering.
Force Fed Lies and name change (2009Ã¢â‚¬â€œpresent)

In May 2009, Dirge Within signed with E1 Entertainment On July 26, 2009 Dirge Within was the JÃƒÂ¤germeister band at the Chicago date for the Rockstar Mayhem Festival. They shared the stage with God Forbid, All That Remains, and Trivium.



Dirge Within has toured with bands such as Trivium, DevilDriver, Whitechapel, Chimaira, Static-X, and Darkest Hour. In support of their album, the band is currently touring with Fear Factory from March 22-May 15, 2010 and will tour with GWAR from June 1Ã¢â‚¬â€œ26, 2010. Dirge Within also opened for Korn on the Minneapolis stop of their Ballroom Blitz tour on May 17, 2010. October 2010 the band will be part of Greenbay, Wi Savage Fest as well as special show with Five Finger Death Punch in Milwaukee, Wi at The Rave. The band continued touring in 2011 with Kittie to support the digital ep of Absolution via Big Time Records. 
 Only one constant remains, and it's not very hard to figure out where the problem truly lay."In October 2012 it was announced that the new lead singer is Travis Neal of Divine Heresy.
 November 2012 the band gave out a free re recorded version of the track "Without You" with new singer Travis Neal via SoundCloud, and YouTube. As of 2013, Dirge Within has begun writing for a new album.

In September 2013, the members announced the birth of a new band The Bloodline and were leaving the history and band Dirge Within behind.
After the birth of The Bloodline

The bloodline was signed to Another Century/Century Media in 2014. The bloodline has recorded their debut release "We are one" to be release on 05/04/15 through Another Century/Century Media.
